00022 class float3x3
00023 {
00024 public:
00025     enum
00026     { 
00028         ROWS    = 3, 
00030         COLUMNS = 3, 
00032         SIZE    = 9,
00033     };
00034 
00035 #ifdef _DEBUG
00036 
00037     float3x3()                                                                      {float v = ::sqrtf(-1.f); for ( int i = 0 ; i < ROWS ; ++i ) for ( int j = 0 ; j < COLUMNS ; ++j ) m[i][j] = v;}
00038 #else
00039     float3x3()                                                                      {}
00040 #endif
00041 
00043     float3x3( const float3& axis, float angle );
00044     
00046     float3x3(  float m00, float m01, float m02, 
00047         float m10, float m11, float m12,
00048         float m20, float m21, float m22 );
00049 
00051     explicit float3x3( float diagonal );
00052     
00054     explicit float3x3( const quaternion& q );
00055 
00057     float3x3&       operator+=( const float3x3& other )                         {for ( int i = 0 ; i < ROWS ; ++i ) for ( int j = 0 ; j < COLUMNS ; ++j ) m[i][j] += other.m[i][j]; return *this;}
00058     
00060     float3x3&       operator-=( const float3x3& other )                         {for ( int i = 0 ; i < ROWS ; ++i ) for ( int j = 0 ; j < COLUMNS ; ++j ) m[i][j] -= other.m[i][j]; return *this;}
00061     
00063     float3x3&       operator*=( const float3x3& other )                         {return *this = *this * other;}
00064     
00066     float3x3&       operator*=( float s )                                           {for ( int i = 0 ; i < ROWS ; ++i ) for ( int j = 0 ; j < COLUMNS ; ++j ) m[i][j] *= s; return *this;}
00067 
00069     float&          operator()( int row, int column )                               {return m[row][column];}
00070     
00072     void            set( int row, int column, float value )                         {m[row][column]=value;}
00073 
00075     void            setColumn( int i, const float3& c )                         {m[0][i]=c[0]; m[1][i]=c[1]; m[2][i]=c[2];}
00076 
00078     void            setRow( int i, const float3& c )                                {m[i][0]=c[0]; m[i][1]=c[1]; m[i][2]=c[2];}
00079 
00084     void            generateOrthonormalBasisFromZ( const float3& axis );
00085 
00087     float3x3        operator+( const float3x3& other ) const                        {float3x3 a; for ( int i = 0 ; i < ROWS ; ++i ) for ( int j = 0 ; j < COLUMNS ; ++j ) a.m[i][j] = m[i][j] + other.m[i][j]; return a;}
00088     
00090     float3x3        operator-( const float3x3& other ) const                        {float3x3 a; for ( int i = 0 ; i < ROWS ; ++i ) for ( int j = 0 ; j < COLUMNS ; ++j ) a.m[i][j] = m[i][j] - other.m[i][j]; return a;}
00091 
00093     float3x3        operator-() const                                               {float3x3 a; for ( int i = 0 ; i < ROWS ; ++i ) for ( int j = 0 ; j < COLUMNS ; ++j ) a.m[i][j] = -m[i][j]; return a;}
00094     
00096     float3x3        operator*( float s ) const                                      {float3x3 a; for ( int i = 0 ; i < ROWS ; ++i ) for ( int j = 0 ; j < COLUMNS ; ++j ) a.m[i][j] = m[i][j] * s; return a;}
00097     
00099     float3x3        operator*( const float3x3& other ) const;
00100 
00101     /* Matrix multiplication with 3-vector as 1-column matrix.*/
00102     float3          operator*( const float3& v ) const;
00103     
00105     bool            operator==( const float3x3& other ) const                       {for ( int i = 0 ; i < ROWS ; ++i ) for ( int j = 0 ; j < COLUMNS ; ++j ) if ( m[i][j] != other.m[i][j] ) return false; return true;}
00106     
00108     bool            operator!=( const float3x3& other ) const                       {for ( int i = 0 ; i < ROWS ; ++i ) for ( int j = 0 ; j < COLUMNS ; ++j ) if ( m[i][j] != other.m[i][j] ) return true; return false;}
00109 
00111     const float&    operator()( int row, int column ) const                         {return m[row][column];}
00112 
00114     float           get( int row, int column ) const                                {return m[row][column];}
00115 
00117     float3          getColumn( int i ) const                                        {float3 d; d[0]=m[0][i]; d[1]=m[1][i]; d[2]=m[2][i]; return d;}
00118 
00120     const float3&   getRow( int i ) const                                           {return *reinterpret_cast<const float3*>(m[i]);} //{float3 d; d[0]=m[i][0]; d[1]=m[i][1]; d[2]=m[i][2]; return d;}
00121 
00123     float           determinant() const;
00124 
00126     float3x3        transpose() const;
00127 
00129     float3x3        inverse() const;
00130

00136 
00138     float3          rotate( const float3& v ) const;

00141     bool            finite() const;

00144     float           m[ROWS][COLUMNS];
00145 };
